scripts.start:backend: cd backend && npm i && npm run prisma:generate && npm run start:dev -- --preserveWatchOutput
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm i && npm run prisma:generate && npm run build
scripts.start:backend:prod: cd backend && npm i && npm run start:prod
scripts.start:consumer: cd consumer && npm i && npm run prisma:generate && npm run start:all:dev -- --preserveWatchOutput
scripts.build:consumer: cd consumer && npm i && npm run prisma:generate && npm run build
scripts.start:consumer:prod: cd consumer && npm i && npm run start:all:prod
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm i && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n backend,consumer,frontend,queue,smtp -c yellow,green,blue,magenta,cyan "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:consumer" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:queue" "npm run start:smtp"
scripts.build: concurrently -n backend,consumer,frontend,queue,smtp -c yellow,green,blue,magenta,cyan "npm run build:backend" "npm run build:consumer" "npm run build:frontend"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently -k -n backend,consumer,frontend,queue,smtp -c yellow,green,blue,magenta,cyan "npm run start:backend:prod" "npm run start:consumer:prod" "npm run start:queue" "npm run start:smtp"
scripts.pm2:start:prod: pm2 start npm --name backend -- run start:backend:prod && pm2 start npm --name consumer -- run start:consumer:prod && pm2 start npm --name queue -- run start:queue && pm2 start npm --name smtp -- run start:smtp
scripts.pm2:restart:prod: pm2 restart backend && pm2 restart consumer && pm2 restart queue && pm2 restart smtp
scripts.pm2:stop:prod: pm2 stop backend && pm2 stop consumer && pm2 stop queue && pm2 stop smtp
scripts.pm2:logs:prod: pm2 logs backend && pm2 logs consumer && pm2 logs queue && pm2 logs smtp
